summary: Turns Lydia into a super hot redhead 18 year old, also includes Character preset for a more mature adult sized version of lydia in the character creation menu in female nord presets.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod, it was created using the Creation Kit Tool with the addition of the Mods Below

I\'ve discovered this mod is not compatible with UFO- Ultimate follower overhaul, you will have to edit the esp file using the construction kit to match the character mesh and texture data in my esp file included in this mod.

Required:
Apachii Skyhair v1.5 ful
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D10168&pUp=1)

Telthalions Red Hair
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6485)

Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/?) click the download (NMM) button for proper version
 or SG Female Textures Renewal

This is my first mod so be patient with me, I tried to create a NMM file out of it but i couldn\'t get it to work so you will have to install in manually to your skyrim directory

Make sure to get the latest versions of Caliente\'s body mod listed above and underwear versions work fine too. If it still doesn\'t work try getting the latest SKSE
(Please note that all the mods must be active and the esp files on for the mod to work)
I would prefer you choose Caliente\'s over SG Female because I used Caliente\'s in the pics
author: Zetoraki
